Package com.blukii.sdk.discovery

blukii library package for discovery of BluetoothLE (BLE) modules.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlukiiClient.OnDecryptSecureBeaconsListener
    Listener interface for callbacks of BlukiiClient.decryptSecureBeacons(List, OnDecryptSecureBeaconsListener).
    BlukiiClient.OnDiscoveryListener
    Callbacks for the BLE discovery.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AxisData
    Read only data set for 3D axis data
    BeaconSensorData
    Read only data object for sensor data that is emitted by blukii beacons BeaconSensorData values are part of DiscoveryData.
    BlukiiClient
    Main controller class of package discovery, for discovering BLE modules and their advertised data BlukiiClient class contains discovery functions as follows: Discovery of BLE modules and extracting BLE advertised data Decryption of blukii SecureBeacon advertising.
    DiscoveryData
    Read only data object for emitted data of one Bluetooth LE (BLE) module.
    DiscoveryProfile
    Definition of the discovery profile.
    DiscoverySettings
    Property set of settings to configure the discovering process.
    DiscoverySettings.ScanFilters
    Helper for Default Filter Lists
    EddystoneData
    Read only data object for Eddystone data that is emitted by beacons See Eddystone specification at https://github.com/google/eddystone/blob/master/protocol-specification.md EddystoneData can contain data of unencrypted EddyStone UID, URL and TLM.
    IBeaconData
    Read only data object for iBeacon data that is emitted by beacons See iBeacon specification at https://developer.apple.com/ibeacon IBeaconData values are part of DiscoveryData.
    KeyData
    Read only data set for blukii SmartKey
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BlukiiDiscoveryError
    Error codes for discovery functions of class BlukiiClient
    BlukiiDiscoveryInfo
    Info codes for discovery functions of class BlukiiClient
    SecureBeaconState
    Indicates if blukii SmartBeacon is sending SecureBeacon advertising and if DiscoveryData object contains encrypted data.

Package com.blukii.sdk.discovery Description

blukii library package for discovery of BluetoothLE (BLE) modules.

This documentation describes the discovery package for scanning of BLE modules especially for blukiis.

The discovery package supports you by doing the following actions:
  • Discovery of modules inside the mobile device BLE range and reading protocol based information:
    • Basic values like module name, RSSI value and discovery time
    • blukii specific advertising like battery, power and firmware
    • blukii sensor data
    • Eddystone beacon protocol data
    • iBeacon beacon protocol data

  • Encryption of blukii SecureBeacon advertising


Getting started:

The main controller for discovery is class BlukiiClient. You only have to create an instance of this class to get all the functionality.

Follow the instructions of the BlukiiClient documentation page where you can find some code samples about the usage.
